attributes.action:
Elimination of the Taxes, Top Secret Acts. 
Update of government structure.
attributes.additional_details:
In fact it is pointless to demand changes from a government who don’t serve the nation.
Good news is:
You can enjoy a freedom right now, based on your free will and Equality act 2010 & Modern slavery act 2015.

So

SIMPLY join me on facebook profile "Polska Powstanie" to become a member of Neutral System Ideology. 

Ideology ruled the people from the beginning of our specie, in a global, national and unites scale. Each of us has free will and has a right to believe any ideology.
attributes.background:
According to your free will and current law (Equality act 2010 & Modern slavery act 2015) you can believe any ideology.
Currently you are living in Capitalism, which slaves you (by imposing on you taxes, law which discriminate people)
You can change it by introducing Neutral system to your life.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
